task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the multiplication feature of the Calculator app.

prereq.p: To succesfully multiply numbers, you must know what is multiplication.

result.p: The result from the substraction is displayed.

example.p: You want to multiply 2 with 3. The equation will look like: 3*2=6. You enter 3. Press multiply. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 6 appears on the screen.
